subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Vendee Globe Challenge
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: At 29, François Gabart became the youngest sailor to win the grueling Vendée Globe. He also set a record by finishing the race in under 80 days.
snippet: At 29, François Gabart became the youngest sailor to win the grueling Vendée Globe. He also set a record by finishing the race in under 80 days.
